sentences.en: And added that its trade group worried about protectionist tendencies.
sentences.cn: 并补充道,其对集团内出现贸易保护主义倾向感到担心.

sentences.en: And this week, protectionist tensions rose to the surface in both countries.
sentences.cn: 本周, 保护主义紧张情绪在两国都浮出水面.

sentences.en: But challenges to this consensus may come from the protectionist far - left and the nationalist far - right .
sentences.cn: 但是,对这一共识的挑战可能既来自 极左 的保护主义,也来自 极右 的民族主义.

sentences.en: Either way, the risks of a protectionist backlash against China would rise.
sentences.cn: 不管采取哪种做法, 中国遭遇保护主义反弹的风险都将增加.

sentences.en: Falling demand is exacerbated by growing protectionist pressures and a withdrawal of trade credit.
sentences.cn: 需求的萎缩因保护主义压力的增大和商业信贷撤离而加剧.

sentences.en: If China is thwarted by protectionist barriers, its people will be correspondingly frustrated and dangerous.
sentences.cn: 如果中国受阻于贸易保护主义壁垒, 那么中国人也会为之感到沮丧而变得危险起来.

sentences.en: It'should also avoid protectionist trade measures at all costs.
sentences.cn: 同时还应不惜一切代价避免保护主义贸易措施.

sentences.en: Mr Huckabee's weakness is that his protectionist and anti - corporate rhetoric appals economic conservatives.
sentences.cn: 哈克比先生的弱点在于他的贸易保护主义者和 反 公司的言论吓坏了经济保守派.

sentences.en: Persistently high unemployment fuels protectionist tendencies.
sentences.cn: 失业率持续高企会助长保护主义倾向.

sentences.en: Private direct investment may follow, especially as a way to circumvent trade protectionist measures.
sentences.cn: 私人直接投资可能会紧随其后, 特别是作为一种避开贸易保护主义措施的手段.

sentences.en: Recipient countries shouldn't erect protectionist barriers or discriminate against the funds, according to the principles.
sentences.cn: 根据这些准则,投资目的国不应该设立保护主义壁垒,或歧视这些基金.

sentences.en: These are the arguments behind an increasingly protectionist mood in Washington.
sentences.cn: 这些就是华盛顿越来越多的贸易保护主义情绪背后的论调.

sentences.en: They also warn againsturge to place protectionist barriers up.
sentences.cn: 他们同时警告说,要提防设立贸易保护主义壁垒.

sentences.en: They claim such tariffs are in effect protectionist measures.
sentences.cn: 他们声称,此类关税其实就是保护主义措施.

sentences.en: Trade frictions between the two countries had been caused by trade protectionists.
sentences.cn: 两国间的贸易摩擦是由贸易保护主义者引起的。

sentences.en: We should avoid protectionist attitudes against these funds.
sentences.cn: 我们应该避免用保护主义的姿态对待这些基金.

words.tran_cn: 防护的；关切保护的；保护贸易的
保护主义，贸易保护主义
保护器；保护者；保护装置；防御者
保护国；摄政政体；摄政职位；摄政任期

trans.tran_en: A protectionist is someone who agrees with and supports protectionism
